mapper.sql: t.pkid pkid, t.id id, t.trsymc trsymc, t.trsywz trsywz, t.trsylx trsylx, t.sz sz, t.ywksq ywksq, t.sjbh sjbh, t.trsyrl trsyrl, t.trsymj trsymj, t.jgid jgid, t.czyid czyid, t.jlzt jlzt, t.cszt cszt, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.bz bz, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.sjbb sjbb, t.ywxtbsid ywxtbsid, TO_CHAR(t.vercol,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') vercol, t.tbjdh tbjdh, TO_CHAR(t.tbsjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') tbsjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, TO_CHAR(t.reserve3,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve3
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM SY_TRSYXX t WHERE 1=1 AND JLZT = 0

SELECT
FROM SY_TRSYXX t WHERE t.JLZT = 0
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SY_TRSYXX(pkid,id,trsymc,trsywz,trsylx,sz,ywksq,sjbh,trsyrl,trsymj,jgid,czyid,jlzt,cszt,sjc,bz,cjsj,sjbb,ywxtbsid,vercol,tbjdh,tbsjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3) VALUES(#{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{trsymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{trsywz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{trsylx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ywksq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{trsyrl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{trsymj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{vercol,jdbcType=DATE},#{tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE SY_TRSYXX t SET t.JLZT = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO SY_TRSYXX(pkid,id,trsymc,trsywz,trsylx,sz,ywksq,sjbh,trsyrl,trsymj,jgid,czyid,jlzt,cszt,sjc,bz,cjsj,sjbb,ywxtbsid,vercol,tbjdh,tbsjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3) VALUES
#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} id,#{item.trsymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} trsymc,#{item.trsywz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} trsywz,#{item.trsylx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} trsylx,#{item.sz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sz,#{item.ywksq,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ywksq,#{item.sjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sjbh,#{item.trsyrl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} trsyrl,#{item.trsymj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} trsymj,#{item.jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgid,#{item.czyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} czyid,#{item.jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jlzt,#{item.cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} cszt,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sjbb,#{item.ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ywxtbsid,#{item.vercol,jdbcType=DATE} vercol,#{item.tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} tbjdh,#{item.tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE} tbsjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=DATE} reserve3
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE pkid = VALUES(pkid), id = VALUES(id), trsymc = VALUES(trsymc), trsywz = VALUES(trsywz), trsylx = VALUES(trsylx), sz = VALUES(sz), ywksq = VALUES(ywksq), sjbh = VALUES(sjbh), trsyrl = VALUES(trsyrl), trsymj = VALUES(trsymj), jgid = VALUES(jgid), czyid = VALUES(czyid), jlzt = VALUES(jlzt), cszt = VALUES(cszt), sjc = VALUES(sjc), bz = VALUES(bz), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), sjbb = VALUES(sjbb), ywxtbsid = VALUES(ywxtbsid), vercol = VALUES(vercol), tbjdh = VALUES(tbjdh), tbsjc = VALUES(tbsjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM SY_TRSYXX t WHERE t.JLZT = 0
